title: Why Are Republicans Being So Mean?
description:
This week Felix, Anna, and Emily discuss the price of oil, the Paycheck Protection Program round two, and the results of their informal poll on stimulus checks. 
Slate Plus members get a bonus segment on Slate Money each week, and no ads. Sign up now to listen and support our show.
In the Slate Plus segment: The United States Oil Fund.
Email: slatemoney@slate.com
Podcast production by Jessamine Molli.

Twitter: @felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas, @EmilyRPeck
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
